short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upload attachments to Traact directly from Gmail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Traact is a leading legal operations platform that helps legal and operations teams stay organized in one platform. The Traact Gmail Extension takes that experience to the next level by bringing Traact's capabilities directly into your Gmail inbox.

Key Features:
Matter Creation:  Quickly create new matters directly from Gmail, inputting details like name, collaborators, and practice area, and attaching emails to existing Traact tasks and projects
One-Click Transfer: Effortlessly transfer files to the corresponding matter in Traact with one single click. 
Seamless Integration: The Traact Chrome Extension seamlessly integrates with your Gmail workflow, streamlining matter and file management without leaving your email.
